subject: Adoption of enhancement of maximum limit of Retirement Gratuity and Death Gratuity from Rs.20 lakh to Rs.25 lakh

No. 94547)} Sub: Adoption of enhancement of maximum limit of Retirement Gratuity and Death Gratuity from Rs.20 lakh to Rs.25 lakh reg: In partial modification of   Policy Circular No.73/2011 (Admn. /Finance) dated 15.09.2011 (copy enclosed) and consequent upon increase of Dearness Allowance rates from 46% to 50% W.e.f_ 01.01.2024, it has been decided to increase the maximum limit of Retirement Gratuity and Death Gratuity from Rs.2O lakh to Rs.25 lakh with effect from 01.01.2024 in respect of officers & employees of NHAI by adopting the D/o Pension & Pensioner's Welfare OM No.28/03/2024-PGPW(B) / Gratuity/9559 dated 30.05.2024 (copy enclosed)  2. The gratuity shall be released with the approval of the CGM (HR/Admn: ) , subject to the condition that amount of gratuity payable shall be calculated by Finance Division. 3. All Cadre Controlling Divisions are requested to take appropriate action in the matter. 4. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above och2y (CS.
